step.framework.extensions
Interface ExtensionListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener
public interface ExtensionListener
extends java.util.EventListener

When properly configured, an extension listener can be used to perform additional resource initialization and destruction related to its extension.

Method Summary
 void extensionDestroyed(ExtensionListenerParameter param)
          Executed just before the extension is destroyed.
 void extensionInitialized(ExtensionListenerParameter param)
          Executed just before the extension is ready for use.
 

Method Detail

extensionInitialized

                          throws ExtensionException
Executed just before the extension is ready for use.

Parameters:

Throws:
ExtensionException - to report a problem
